newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SNB says continues liquidity for money market.
newsitem.headline: SNB says continues liquidity for money market.

text.p: Swiss National Bank directors decided to add a "significant quantity" of liquidity to the money market at their weekly meeting, a spokesman said.
"The board of directors saw no reason to change the discount rate," the spokesman told Reuters.
"But the board did decide to continue adding a significant quantity of liquidity to the money market," he said.
"This operation has already begun," the spokesman added.
The SNB has been pumping liquidity into the money market recently in an effort to abate upward pressure on money market rates. -- Zurich Newsroom, +41-1-631 7340
